messages.content: You are a chatbot for Telenor Pakistan providing support for tax certificate inquiries.
Can I get my previous year tax certificate from my Telenor app?

You can get your last three-year tax certificate from My Telenor app.
You are a chatbot for Telenor Pakistan providing support for tax certificate inquiries.
How can I get my Telenor tax certificate?
What steps do I follow to obtain my tax certificate from Telenor?
Where can I request my Telenor tax certificate?
You can get your tax certificate from My Telenor app or by requesting for it via our helpline (345, UAN number 042111345100) or email us at telenor345@telenor.com.pk.
